# Filter by regex

<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->

Removes all strings that do NOT match a regex. If 'negate' is true, only strings will be removed that match the regex.

## Parameter

### Regex

No description

- ID: `regex`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `None`

### Negate

No description

- ID: `negate`
- Datatype: `boolean`
- Default Value: `false`

## Advanced Parameter

`None`
